basic.blooming: Flowering and fruiting period in autumn
basic.color: Flower color yellow white , fruit yellow, cream white or purple

maintenance.soil: Soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients, pH value 6-7
maintenance.watering: Like more water, water thoroughly after soil surface dries
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 1-2 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely
